name: NSUserNotificationCenter
desc: An object that delivers notifications from apps to the user.DeprecatedUse the User Notifications framework instead.

items.name: class var `default`: NSUserNotificationCenter
items.desc: Returns the default user notification center.

items.name: var scheduledNotifications: [NSUserNotification]
items.desc: Specifies an array of scheduled user notifications that have not yet been delivered.

items.name: func removeScheduledNotification(NSUserNotification)
items.desc: Removes the specified user notification for the scheduled notifications.

items.name: var deliveredNotifications: [NSUserNotification]
items.desc: An array of all user notifications delivered to the notification center.

items.name: func removeDeliveredNotification(NSUserNotification)
items.desc: Remove a delivered user notification from the user notification center.

items.name: func removeAllDeliveredNotifications()
items.desc: Remove all delivered user notifications from the user notification center.
